title: The Future of Web Development: What's Next in 2024

sections.title: Overview
sections.markdown: Explore the latest trends in web development, from AI-powered tools to new frameworks that are reshaping how we build the web. Discover what developers need to know to stay ahead.

| Svelte    | Frontend  | ★★★★☆      |
